name: Retro Pinball
description:
"Retro Pinball " is a collection of seven pinball tables based on the great machines of the early 1990s! With the possibility of additional tables to be added in future updates for free!

Tables:

- Tropical Splash
- David Slade Mysteries
- GoreBall
- Pool Hall Deluxe
- Call To War
- Zen Garden
- RD's Adventure Mini Golf Pinball Edition (Included in Update 1.6)

Features:

- Full 3D tables, with Unique Themes
- Killer Soundtrack
- Rich Dynamic Audio
- Four Camera Angles
- Local Leader board
And more!
